original: @22b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: rgya gar skad du

original: ha st'a bha ba pra ka ra na k'a ri k'a /
analyzed: ha sta bha ba pra ka ra na ka ri ka

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du

original: rab tu byed pa lag pa'i tshad kyi tshig le'ur byas pa /
analyzed: rab tu byed ba lag ba tshad kyi tshig leur byed ba

original: bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: joms ldan da ngag gi dbang po la phyag tshal lo

original: thag pa la ni sbrul snyam 'dzin //
analyzed: thag ba la ni sbrul snyam dzin

original: thag par mthong na don med do //
analyzed: thag ba mthong na don med do

original: de'i cha mthong na de la yang //
analyzed: de cha mthong na de la yang

original: sbrul bzhin shes pa 'khrul pa yin//
analyzed: sbrul bzhin shes ba khrul ba

original: brtags pa'i dngos po thams cad la //
analyzed: rtog ba dngos po thams cad la

original: rang gi ngo bo brtags pa na //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo rtog ba na

original: kun rdzob shes pa'i spyod yul ni //
analyzed: kun rdzob shes ba spyod yul ni

original: ji snyed yod pa gzhan las brtags //
analyzed: ji snyed yod ba gzhan las rtog

original: cha med brtag par bya min phyir //
analyzed: cha med rtog ba byed min phyir

original: tha ma yang ni med par mtshungs //
analyzed: tha ma yang ni med ba mtshungs

original: de phyir mkhas pas 'khrul ba tsam //
analyzed: de phyir mkhas ba khrul ba tsam

original: yang dag don du min par brtag /'khrul na de yang ma dag phyir //
analyzed: yang dag don du min ba rtog na de yang ma dag phyir

original: ji ltar snang na de ltar med //
analyzed: ji ltar snang na de ltar med

original: don yod ma yin snang ba ni //
analyzed: don yod ma yin snang ba ni

original: ji ltar de yi bdag nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar de yi bdag nyid gyur

original: gang zhig zhib mo'i blo yis ni //
analyzed: gang jig zhib mo blo yis ni

original: thams cad btags pa kho nar shes //
analyzed: thams cad dogs ba kho nar shes

original: blo ldan de ni chags la sogs //
analyzed: blo ldan de ni chags la sogs

original: bde bar sbrul gyis skrag bzhin spong //
analyzed: bde ba sbrul gyis skrag bzhin spong

original: 'jig rten pa yi don rtogs pas //
analyzed: jig rten ba yi don rtogs ba

original: 'jig rten bzhin du bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: jig rten bzhin du sgrub ba byed

original: kun nas nyon mongs spong 'dod pas //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs spong dod ba

original: dam pa'i don gyis btsal bar bya //
analyzed: dam ba don gyis btsal ba byed

original: rab tu byed pa lag pa'i tshad kyi tshig le'ur byas pa /
analyzed: rab tu byed ba lag ba tshad kyi tshig leur byed ba

original: slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon phag ba lhas mdzad ba rdzogs so
